attributes.action: Knight Craig David and make him a Sir
attributes.additional_details:
Numerous UK and Would Number 1 singles
Numerous UK and Would Number 1 albums
Representative for the UK garage scene
attributes.background: Craig David is arguably one of the countries finest treasures. Reaching out to a wide audience, his music has inspired generation after generation and having resumed his career in 2015, shows what a leader he is in his field.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
